streams.room01_stream: CREATE STREAM room01_stream () WITH (DATASOURCE="telemetry/01", FORMAT="json", TYPE="mqtt", CONF_KEY="default", SHARED="true")
streams.room02_stream: CREATE STREAM room02_stream () WITH (DATASOURCE="telemetry/02", FORMAT="json", TYPE="mqtt", CONF_KEY="default", SHARED="true")
streams.room03_stream: CREATE STREAM room03_stream () WITH (DATASOURCE="telemetry/03", FORMAT="json", TYPE="mqtt", CONF_KEY="default", SHARED="true")
streams.room04_stream: CREATE STREAM room04_stream () WITH (DATASOURCE="telemetry/04", FORMAT="json", TYPE="mqtt", CONF_KEY="default", SHARED="true")
streams.room05_stream: CREATE STREAM room05_stream () WITH (DATASOURCE="telemetry/05", FORMAT="json", TYPE="mqtt", CONF_KEY="default", SHARED="true")
streams.room06_stream: CREATE STREAM room06_stream () WITH (DATASOURCE="telemetry/06", FORMAT="json", TYPE="mqtt", CONF_KEY="default", SHARED="true")
streams.room07_stream: CREATE STREAM room07_stream () WITH (DATASOURCE="telemetry/07", FORMAT="json", TYPE="mqtt", CONF_KEY="default", SHARED="true")
streams.room08_stream: CREATE STREAM room08_stream () WITH (DATASOURCE="telemetry/08", FORMAT="json", TYPE="mqtt", CONF_KEY="default", SHARED="true")

rules.downsample_room_01: {"sql":"SELECT room_id, AVG(temperature) as temperature, AVG(humidity) as humidity, AVG(co2_ppm) as co2_ppm, AVG(light_lux) as light_lux, MAX(occupancy_count) as occupancy_count, MAX(CAST(motion_detected, INT)) as motion_detected, AVG(energy_kwh) as energy_kwh, AVG(air_quality_index) as air_quality_index, MAX(timestamp) as timestamp FROM room01_stream GROUP BY room_id, HOPPINGWINDOW(ss, 10, 5)","actions":[{"mqtt":{"server":"tcp://nanomq:1883","topic":"ds_telemetry/01","qos":1,"sendSingle":true}},{"file":{"path":"/data/ekuiper/ds_room_01.jsonl","fileType":"lines","format":"json","hasHeader":false,"rollingInterval":86400000,"checkInterval":600000,"rollingCount":50,"rollingNamePattern":"prefix"}}]}
rules.downsample_room_02: {"sql":"SELECT room_id, AVG(temperature) as temperature, AVG(humidity) as humidity, AVG(co2_ppm) as co2_ppm, AVG(light_lux) as light_lux, MAX(occupancy_count) as occupancy_count, MAX(CAST(motion_detected, INT)) as motion_detected, AVG(energy_kwh) as energy_kwh, AVG(air_quality_index) as air_quality_index, MAX(timestamp) as timestamp FROM room02_stream GROUP BY room_id, HOPPINGWINDOW(ss, 10, 5)","actions":[{"mqtt":{"server":"tcp://nanomq:1883","topic":"ds_telemetry/02","qos":1,"sendSingle":true}},{"file":{"path":"/data/ekuiper/ds_room_02.jsonl","fileType":"lines","format":"json","hasHeader":false,"rollingInterval":86400000,"checkInterval":600000,"rollingCount":50,"rollingNamePattern":"prefix"}}]}
